description:
Summary score for the Zung Depression Scale. [Zung WW 1965 (PubMed ID: 14221692)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/14221692) Individual item range from 1 to 4. A total score is derived by summing the individual item scores, ranging from 20 to 80. A score of 70 and above indicates severe depression.

[Search for all Zung Depression Scale variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/wsc/variables?search=zung)
